DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effectiveness cost-effectiveness integrate care program statutory health insurance offer additional homeopathic treatment member
DOC.detailed_description: The German statutory health insurance 'Techniker Krankenkasse ' offer integrate additional homeopathic treatment . To date , offer evaluate . Therefore aim investigate effectiveness well cost-effectiveness program adolescent ( 12-17 year ) adults various chronic disease . In observational study plan compare patient participate integrated care project match insured person Techniker Krankenkasse participate program . Matching base gender , age diagnosis . Regarding diagnosis , plan include adolescent : asthma , allergic rhinitis atopic eczema ; adult asthma , allergic rhinitis atopic migraine , headache depression . To measure effectiveness , patient complete diagnosis-specific questionnaire baseline 3 , 6 12 month . The primary outcome diagnosis measure diagnosis-specific questionnaire 6 month . Secondary outcome include quality life ( SF-12 ) 3 , 6 12 month well diagnosis-specific questionnaire 3 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Newly register integrated care program Insured least 1 year Techniker Krankenkasse Having access internet email least week Adults follow diagnosis : asthma , allergic rhinitis , atopic eczema , migraine , tension headache , depression Adolescents follow diagnosis : asthma , allergic rhinitis , atopic eczema inform write consent Exclusion criterion : Participation diseasemanagement program Participation intervention study Cancer diagnosis current usage complementary therapy ( control group )
